channel.title: Rails4 on Icebergist
channel.description: Recent content in Rails4 on Icebergist

item.title: RailsDiff
item.description: RailsDiff is a very useful site when upgrading Rails versions (for example, from Rails 3.2 to Rails 4). It will generate default Rails app using two different Rails versions and it will compare them. The result is that you can see all the configuration changes (like in application.rb) and all other changes – which is really useful when upgrading to new Rails version.
